p: In summary, to support our analyses in the main manuscript we have considered 4 simple conceptual cases in which pairs of component error and response terms in Eq. 1 are assumed small. Our four regression results for the AMIP5/CMIP5 ensemble for 40–60°S rule out cases 2 to 4 but are broadly consistent with case 1 (the conceptual case model presented in the main manuscript), where the ocean model C bias (Δ C O) and C response terms (Δ C R and λ C ) are assumed small.
